CDSP Student Organization Information and Voting System

About The System

Hello everyone! In behalf of Team Katagumpay, My Name is Marco from BSIT 1-42 of Colegio de San Pedro! As a Team Leader of this project, we are proudly to introduce to you our madely "CDSP Student Organization Information and Voting System". This voting system can help our co-students to view some basic information on an organization and to vote and also to the election admin can manage the election easily.

As an open-source project developed together with my helpful and hardworking teammates Andrei Leyva and Francis Yabes we are here to help you on how to use the system!

Features:

-For Admin
*Can Add by Importing or Manual Adding Voters and modify them
*Can Add by Importing and Delete Candidate
*Can monitor election status
*Can print election data (Voters, Candidates, and Election Results)

-For Voters
*Can View Basic Organization Information
*Can Vote

Note :
-For admin, sending voter's credentials can be done by installing an add-on in microsoft excel
which is kutools add-on we will have a tutorial video on how to use the add-on, but still we are trying our best to integrate it on the system thru phpmailer.
-For admin, the election tally can be refreshed manually by pressing "F5" button, however we are also still trying our best to make it automatically refreshed thru ajax.
-For Voters, in case you forgot the password you can message the election admin by clicking on the messenger icon to revert it to default password.
